attributes.action: Investigate voting malpractice in the 2015 Oldham by election
attributes.additional_details: There have been reports of large numbers of postal votes being submitted by immigrant families.  In one case there are reported to be 47 postal votes submitted from one address.
attributes.background: Reports show there has possibly been voting abuse in the Oldham by election held 3rd December 2015.

rejection.details: Electoral fraud is a crime. If you believe you have evidence of fraud, that would be a matter for the police.
